content: of the body pop the needle out on the back of the potato about 10 row up pull the yarn through but leave an inch or so for a tail insert the needle back in to the mc in row 1 and then back out the same spot as before pull the yarn as tight as possible this will start to create visible booty cheeks repeat this process two of three more times then tie off and sew in any remaining ends positive potato sign make a sign with a positive saying out of cardstock or notecards and a uncurled paperclip or small piece of dowel i think you re a spud i m rooting for you yukon do it questions and sharing reach out to me at magicalthinkingknits@gmail com or on ravelry with any questions i would love to see what you make i am @magicalthinkingknits on instagram happy making
